decision_conditions: <p>The following plans and documents relate to this application:</p><p>965h Rev4 - Existing Site [Location] Pan and Proposed Block Plan; Materials and 45 degree First Floor Clearance; Existing and Proposed Front Elevations; Proposed Roof Plan;[Front and Rear Existing and Proposed Elevations; Side Existing and Proposed Elevations; Ground and First Floor Existing Plans; Loft and Roof Existing Plans; Ground and First Floor Proposed Plans; Loft and Roof Proposed Plans; Fire Safety â€“ Reasonable Exemption Statement (received 14.08.24)</p><p><br></p>

<p>Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the southern side elevation with no. 45 Paines Lane of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.</p>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single and two storey side extension; conversion of garage into habitable room; single storey rear extension; alterations and extension to roof; two front dormers and one rear dormer; rooflights in both side roof slopes; external alterations (demolition of porch, conservatory and rear extension)
